metadata.title: CVE-2020-15365 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: LibRaw before 0.20-Beta3 has an out-of-bounds write in parse_exif() in metadata\exif_gps.cpp via an unrecognized AtomName and a zero value of tiff_nifds.

criterions.comment: darktable package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
